data.text: I have a mild fever and a slight cough.
My allergies are acting up, and my eyes are itchy.
I twisted my ankle while running, and it's swollen.
I have a persistent sore throat and difficulty swallowing.
I accidentally touched a hot pan, and my hand is burnt.
I fell off my bike and have a deep cut on my knee.
I have a persistent headache, and the pain is getting worse.
My stomach hurts after eating spicy food.
